title: LF Support player
body: I Play adc and im looking for a support player to climb to gold with, my play style is quite aggresive so id prefer a support who can play aggro supports :D

replies.body: im a 1 trick support xerath in plat 3. im the opposite of aggressive but my style suits adc aggression. if you play resets, hypers, or draven you might enjoy a game or two with me.

Supp main, im down to play.
doesnt matter the champ, im hella aggressive.
